Package me.bristermitten.mittenlib.util

Class Futures

java.lang.Object
me.bristermitten.mittenlib.util.Futures
public class Futures extends Object
Utility class for working with Futures and CompletableFutures

    static <T> CompletableFuture<Collection<T>>
    sequence(CompletableFuture<T>... futures)
    Transform an array of CompletableFutures into a single CompletableFuture holding a Collection<T> This is similar to (Haskell's sequence function), but specialised for CompletableFutures because we don't have higher kinded types in Java :(

  • Method Details

    • sequence

      @SafeVarargs public static <T> CompletableFuture<Collection<T>> sequence(CompletableFuture<T>... futures)
      Transform an array of CompletableFutures into a single CompletableFuture holding a Collection<T> This is similar to (Haskell's sequence function), but specialised for CompletableFutures because we don't have higher kinded types in Java :(
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the future
      Parameters:
      futures - An array of futures
      Returns:
      A single future that will be completed when all the arguments have completed, containing all the argument results in a List. The order of the results should be the same as the order of the arguments, but this is not guaranteed.

    • sequence

      public static <T> CompletableFuture<Collection<T>> sequence(Collection<CompletableFuture<T>> futures)
      Transform a collection of CompletableFutures into a single CompletableFuture holding a Collection<T>
      See Also:
      • sequence(CompletableFuture[])
